metadata.title: CVE-2016-3760 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Bluetooth in Android 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before2016-07-01 allows local users to gain privileges by establishing a pairingthat remains present during a session of the primary user, aka internal bug27410683.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
